video_prompt: A gigantic red dragon descends, its maw opening wide to roar above a changing cityscape. Wisps of red energy emanate from its moving form. A lone human figure, robes billowing, pivots to face the evolving urban decay and a pulsating red orb forming in a chasm. Hazy mists shift through the scene as static elements give way to dynamic terror.
image_prompt: A colossal, vibrant red dragon with glowing yellow eyes and an open, roaring maw dominates a high-contrast, dystopian cityscape. A lone figure in a red robe stands atop an East Asian temple in the foreground, facing a glowing red orb in a massive chasm within the monochromatic city. Hazy mist envelops the scene, creating an ominous, fantastical atmosphere.
refined_video_prompt: A colossal, red-hued form dynamically descends, its maw widening to unleash a thunderous roar. Below, the urban landscape visibly warps and decays. Wisps of red energy continuously emanate and swirl from the descending entity. A lone human's robes dramatically billow as they swiftly pivot, an expression of defiance on their face, confronting the evolving structures and a pulsating red orb actively forming in a chasm. Hazy mists constantly shift and flow, transforming the entire scene from its initial state.
